newsitem.title: UK: Willis Corroon to buy into French broker.
newsitem.headline: Willis Corroon to buy into French broker.

text.p: British insurance broker Willis Corroon Group Plc said on Friday it had agreed in principle to purchase a one-third stake in the largest independent French insurance broker, Gras Savoye & Cie.
"Investment by the group in Gras Savoye and the consequent pooling of capabilities will create a very powerful combination in the French market-place," chairman John Reeve said in a statement.
The transaction is dependent on the satisfactory completion of the group's due diligence procedures and the approval of the shareholders.
A further announcement will be made in due course.
